channel.title: **For Prospective Applicants** on Princeton COS Undergraduate Course Assistants Program
channel.description: Recent content in **For Prospective Applicants** on Princeton COS Undergraduate Course Assistants Program

item.title: How/When to Apply
item.description: This is a page to explain how/when to apply.

item.title: Before Getting Paid...
item.description: This is a page to provide indications of everything that needs to be done before getting paid. To be rewritten # This is to inform you that you have been added to the Payroll System as a Grader in Computer Science. Please go to https://princeton.studentemployment.ngwebsolutions.com/Cmx_Content.aspx?cpId=6 (“Student Employees”->”My Timesheets”) for instruction on how to enter your hours. If you have multiple roles at Princeton for which you are paid, please be sure to enter your hours associated with the correct role.
